/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. Dominating the center of the image is a large tree with a lush canopy of green leaves, standing as a testament to nature's resilience amidst urban development. 

To the right of the tree, two large blue and white domes catch the eye. They are part of the iconic landmark, the Temple of Heaven, a symbol of China's rich history and architectural prowess. The domes, with their intricate patterns and vibrant colors, provide a stark contrast to the natural elements in the scene.

On the left side of the image, a road stretches into the distance, hinting at the bustling city life that surrounds this serene spot. The road, the domes, and the tree together create a harmonious blend of nature, history, and urban life in Beijing. The image is a beautiful representation of the city's unique blend of tradition and modernity.
